scripts.build:server: tsc -p tsconfig.server.json && node -e "const fs=require('node:fs'); const path=require('node:path'); const src=path.join('dist', 'server', 'server', 'matchmaking.js'); const dst=path.join('dist', 'server', 'matchmaking.js'); if (fs.existsSync(src)) fs.copyFileSync(src, dst);"
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.test:core: npm run build && node --test --test-concurrency=1 tests/health.test.js tests/shared-logic.test.js tests/matchmaking.test.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test:core && npm run test:socketflow && npm run test:db-retention
scripts.ci:local: npm run db:init && npm run lint && npm run test:core && npm run test:socketflow && npm run test:db-retention && npm run security
scripts.verify: npm run lint && npm test && npm run security
scripts.ci:local:quick: npm run db:init:local && npm run lint && npm run test:core && npm run test:socketflow:local
